overview:
Frank Febbraro is a co-founder and CTO of Phase2 Technology, a technology firm known for innovative use of content management systems, open data integration and APIs, community applications and semantic web.

Frank is an active leader in the Drupal community and is a contributor/maintainer of many Drupal modules for use in Semantic applications. He is the architect of Phase2’s OpenPublish which integrates ThomsonReuterâ€™s OpenCalais service with Drupal into a Semantic Publishing Platform.

Frank is most interested in integrating current and emerging technologies to solve tomorrow’s challenges. He has been a speaker on practical Semantic Web implementations and software development. He holds a Masters Degree in Computer Science from George Mason University and a BS from James Madison University.
